name: Project 1: Team Project API Basics
description: A simple team project designed to practice use of 3rd party APIs. Our team executed a project that rendered a stylized deployment of the NASA APOD API and also included a simple integration with Slack. When you check it out don't forget to scroll down!

name: Exercise 6: Third Party APIs
description: Individual exercise leveraging Bulma that dives deeper into 3rd party APIs (OpenWeather).

name: Exercise 14: Full Stack MVC app
description: An individual assignment that demonstrates the complete MVC stack leverging Node.js, Sequelize, Handlebars formatted with Bootstrap and deployed to Heroku

name: Project 2: Team Project Full Stack MVC app
description: Team Project exercising the complete MVC stack leverging Node.js, Sequelize, Handlebars and deployed to Heroku. The notable capability here is basic integration with email via sendgrid, and deployment to a custom domain.

name: Exercise 19: React Employee Directory
description: A react exercise that leverages the Random User API to render a table of employees that can be filtered and sorted.

name: Exercise 11: Express.js: Note Taker
description: An Express.js back end exercise (front end code was provided) that connects provided front end code to Express.js back end.
